title: BRIEF-India's August Total Domestic Passenger Vehicle Sales Down 31.57% By Reuters
text:
BRIEF-India's August Total Domestic Passenger Vehicle Sales Down 31.57%

Stock Markets 45 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 11:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's August Total Domestic Passenger Vehicle Sales Down 31.57% Sept 9 (Reuters) - TVS Motor Company Ltd : * INDIA'S AUGUST TOTAL DOMESTIC PASSENGER VEHICLE SALES DOWN -31.57% VERSUS YEAR AGO - INDUSTRY BODY * INDIA'S AUGUST DOMESTIC PASSENGER VEHICLE SALES AT 196524 VEHICLES - INDUSTRY BODY * INDIA'S AUGUST DOMESTIC PASSENGER CAR SALES DOWN 41.09% AT 115957 - INDUSTRY BODY * INDIA'S AUGUST COMMERCIAL VEHICLE SALES DOWN 38.71% AT 51897 - INDUSTRY BODY * INDIA'S AUGUST TWO-WHEELER SALES DOWN 22.24% AT 1514196 - INDUSTRY BODY * INDIA'S AUGUST PASSENGER VEHICLES PRODUCTION DOWN 24.42% AT 277432 - INDUSTRY BODY * INDIA'S APRIL-AUGUST TOTAL DOMESTIC PASSENGER VEHICLE SALES DOWN 23.54% VERSUS YEAR AGO AT 1,109,930 - INDUSTRY BODY * DROP IN PASSENGER VEHICLES AND PASSENGER CAR SALES IN AUGUST WORST EVER - INDUSTRY BODY

BRIEF-India's August Total Domestic Passenger Vehicle Sales Down 31.57%
